Ring is a venture-backed company that has brought the world the first battery operated wifi security and monitoring device, the Ring Video Doorbell (TM). Ring is a passionate team with an unending desire to build great products that can change the world for the better. We are unlike most companies in Santa Monica in that we are both a hardware and a software company which means everyone is exposed to some of the coolest tech you've ever seen. Ring has already been featured in The Wall Street Journal, Wired Magazine and was selected by TIME Magazine as one of the Top 10 Gadgets of 2014. Aside from a fun and unique working environment, we offer extremely competitive benefits, lunches throughout the week, and are the only company that can offer you a Ring Video Doorbell for your front door! http://www.ring.comResponsibilities:Full life cycle recruiting, engaging with applicants from screening phase to offer negotiationAttract applicants by writing compelling job descriptions and post jobs advertisements across various job boards and social media networksActively sources qualified candidates using internet databases, social media, networking events and employee referralsWeekly reporting on recruiting metricsConduct prescreening interviews, in person interviews as well as coordinate on site interviews for staffAct as a subject matter expert and assist in achieving business objectivesPartner in employee on boarding experience

Katherine Vega
Entrepreneur, Media Artist, Web Developer, Freelancer
October 17, 2014, Katherine was a client of Mark’s

Mark Gordon helped me get hired on to my dream job! He is a lifesaver! A little backstory… For 8 months I struggled to find a position in my career field through another recruiting agency that I had been referred to. With that agency, I had to drive a long distance to interview with them before interviewing with a potential employer, take multiple rigorous tests with them, I couldn’t use my pre-existing portfolio, and I was asked to complete complex samples of work with short notice and short deadline despite my work schedule. I also interviewed with multiple companies they attempted to place me with that weren’t the best fit for me… That agency didn’t seem to really listen to or understand what I offer, and it was a lot of wasted time and stress. It was an ENTIRELY different story with Mark. He actually found me on LinkedIn, and he respected my professionalism. He is a great communicator - highly accessible, and very accommodating! Mark submitted me to two companies without requiring an interview with him first, using my portfolio, and I was placed with a company that the previous recruiter had failed with! I converted from contract to hire; and it truly feels like I belong here with consideration to the work my position entails, opportunity for growth, a respectable salary, and an ideal atmosphere! I really didn’t think such a great position with such a great company existed, and I LOVE my job! My quality of life has DRASTICALLY improved, like night and day! Thank you so much Mark!

I had the pleasure of working with Craig when we worked together at Populus Group. He is a tremendously dedicated recruiter and works extremely hard to build great relationships with his consultants, clients and internal peers. He takes his time working with his clients and consultants to understand what their pains, challenges and needs are and he works extremely hard to provide solutions to address these pain points. Any time that I came across a technology that I was not familiar with Craig was only a phone call away willing and able to help with any situation. I highly recommend Craig and believe he would be a tremendous asset to any organization.

Joe is the perfect candidate. I cant speak highly enough of his abilities and personality. While i was recruiting Joe he made himself available 24/7. Every time I would reach out to him he would respond instantly. Joe cares about his career progression, and it shows with his desire to achieve results. Any company would be lucky to land an employee like Joe. If anyone has any questions about his background or his abilities feel free to call me directly at 480-768-7438 with any questions. I hope that I have the chance to work with Joe again. If every person in the IT field worked with the same conviction as Joe recruiters would be out of work.
